languages.text: Группа блюстителей, высаженная для разведки на колонию, возвращается с дряхлым, дурно пахнущим бродягой, волосы которого не знали ножниц годами. Старец бросился к воинам, едва разглядев гербовые цвета династии, и умолял доставить к господину Войгтвиру или Леди Теодоре.

traits.locale_text: {n}Группа, посланная по координатам загадочного сигнала, вернулась с дряхлым, дурно пахнущим человеком, голова которого не знала бритвы годами. В лохмотьях, которые служат ему одеждой, отдаленно угадываются цвета династии фон Валанциус.{/n}

languages.text: The scouting team sent to the colony world returns with a decrepit, shaggy, foul-smelling vagrant in tow. The old man hastened toward the enforcers as soon as he saw the dynasty's colours, and implored them to take him to Master Voigtvir or Lady Theodora.
languages.original_text: Группа блюстителей, высаженная для разведки на колонию, возвращается с дряхлым, дурно пахнущим бродягой, волосы которого не знали ножниц годами. Старец бросился к воинам, едва разглядев гербовые цвета династии, и умолял доставить к господину Войгтвиру или Леди Теодоре.

traits.locale_text: A scouting team of enforcers which landed on the colony world has brought back an old, decrepit, foul-smelling tramp who hasn't had a haircut in years. The old man hastened toward the soldiers as soon as he saw the dynasty's colours, and implored them to take him to Master Voigtvir or Lady Theodora.

A scouting team of enforcers which landed on the colony world has brought back an old, decrepit, foul-smelling tramp who hasn't had a haircut in years. The old man hastened toward the soldiers as soon as he saw the dynasty's colours, and implored them to take him to Master Voigtvir or Lady Theodora.

A scouting team of enforcers was sent to the colony world. They brought back a decrepit, shaggy, foul-smelling tramp. The old man hastened toward the soldiers as soon as he saw the dynasty's colours, and implored them to take him to Master Voigtvir or Lady Theodora.

A scouting team of enforcers was sent to the colony world. They brought back a decrepit, shaggy, foul-smelling tramp. The old man hastened toward the soldiers as soon as he saw the dynasty's colours, and implored them to take him to Master Voigtvir or Lady Theodora.

The scouting team sent to the colony world returns with a decrepit, shaggy, foul-smelling vagrant in tow. The old man hastened toward the enforcers as soon as he saw the dynasty's colours, and implored them to take him to Master Voigtvir or Lady Theodora.

languages.text: El equipo de exploración enviado al mundo colonia regresa con un vagabundo decrépito, desgreñado y maloliente. El anciano corrió hacia los guardias en cuanto vio los colores de la dinastía y suplicó que le llevaran ante el maestro Voigtvir o lady Theodora.
languages.original_text: The scouting team sent to the colony world returns with a decrepit, shaggy, foul-smelling vagrant in tow. The old man hastened toward the enforcers as soon as he saw the dynasty's colours, and implored them to take him to Master Voigtvir or Lady Theodora.

traits.locale_text: El equipo de exploración enviado al mundo colonia regresa con un vagabundo decrépito, desgreñado y maloliente. El anciano corrió hacia los guardias en cuanto vio los colores de la dinastía y suplicó que le llevaran ante el maestro Voigtvir o lady Theodora.

El equipo de exploración enviado al mundo colonia regresa con un vagabundo decrépito, desgreñado y maloliente. El anciano corrió hacia los guardias en cuanto vio los colores de la dinastía y suplicó que le llevaran ante el maestro Voigtvir o lady Theodora.

languages.text: コロニー惑星へ派遣した偵察隊が、ヨボヨボでひどい臭いの老いた浮浪者を連れて戻ってきた。その老人は王朝の旗を目にした途端、エンフォーサーのところへ駆け寄って、マスター・ボイドヴィルかシオドーラ様の元へ連れて行って欲しいと頼み込んだのだ。
languages.original_text: The scouting team sent to the colony world returns with a decrepit, shaggy, foul-smelling vagrant in tow. The old man hastened toward the enforcers as soon as he saw the dynasty's colours, and implored them to take him to Master Voigtvir or Lady Theodora.

traits.locale_text: コロニー惑星へ派遣した偵察隊が、ヨボヨボでひどい臭いの老いた浮浪者を連れて戻ってきた。その老人は王朝の旗を目にした途端、エンフォーサーのところへ駆け寄って、マスター・ボイドヴィルかシオドーラ様の元へ連れて行って欲しいと頼み込んだのだ。
コロニー惑星へ派遣した偵察隊が、ヨボヨボでひどい臭いの老いた浮浪者を連れて戻ってきた。その老人は王朝の旗を目にした途端、エンフォーサーのところへ駆け寄って、マスター・ボイドヴィルかシオドーラ様の元へ連れて行って欲しいと頼み込んだのだ。

languages.text: 前往殖民世界的侦察队带回了一位蓬头垢面、臭气熏天的流浪汉。据称，当时这位老人一看到王朝的旗帜，就急切地朝执法者走来，恳求他们带他去见维特威尔大师或西奥多拉夫人。
languages.original_text: The scouting team sent to the colony world returns with a decrepit, shaggy, foul-smelling vagrant in tow. The old man hastened toward the enforcers as soon as he saw the dynasty's colours, and implored them to take him to Master Voigtvir or Lady Theodora.

前往殖民世界的侦察队带回了一位蓬头垢面、臭气熏天的流浪汉。据称，当时这位老人一看到王朝的旗帜，就急切地朝执法者走来，恳求他们带他去见维特威尔大师或西奥多拉夫人。

languages.text: Der Spähtrupp, der auf die Koloniewelt geschickt wurde, kehrt mit einem heruntergekommenen, zottigen, stinkenden Vagabunden im Schlepptau zurück. Der alte Mann war auf die Enforcer zugeeilt, sobald er die Farben der Dynastie erblickt hatte, und hatte sie angefleht, ihn zu Meister Voigtvir oder Lady Theodora zu führen.
languages.original_text: The scouting team sent to the colony world returns with a decrepit, shaggy, foul-smelling vagrant in tow. The old man hastened toward the enforcers as soon as he saw the dynasty's colours, and implored them to take him to Master Voigtvir or Lady Theodora.

Der alte Mann war auf die Enforcers zugeeilt, sobald er die Farben der Dynastie erblickt hatte, und hatte sie angefleht, ihn zu Meister Voigtvir oder Lady Theodora zu führen.

Der Spähtrupp, der auf die Koloniewelt geschickt wurde, kehrt mit einem heruntergekommenen, zottigen, stinkenden Vagabunden im Schlepptau zurück. Der alte Mann war auf die Enforcers zugeeilt, sobald er die Farben der Dynastie erblickt hatte, und hatte sie angefleht, ihn zu Meister Voigtvir oder Lady Theodora zu führen.

languages.text: L'équipe de reconnaissance envoyée sur le monde colonie est revenue accompagnée d'un vagabond décrépit, hirsute et malodorant. Dès qu'il a vu les couleurs de la dynastie, le vieil homme s'est précipité vers les prévôts et les a implorés de le conduire auprès de maître Voigtvir ou de dame Théodora.
languages.original_text: The scouting team sent to the colony world returns with a decrepit, shaggy, foul-smelling vagrant in tow. The old man hastened toward the enforcers as soon as he saw the dynasty's colours, and implored them to take him to Master Voigtvir or Lady Theodora.

L'équipe de reconnaissance envoyée sur le monde colonie est revenue accompagnée d'un vagabond décrépit, hirsute et malodorant. Dès qu'il a vu les couleurs de la dynastie, le vieil homme s'est précipité vers les prévôts et les a implorés de le conduire auprès de maître Voigtvir ou de dame Théodora.

languages.text: Koloni dünyasına gönderilen keşif ekibi, beraberinde zayıf, kaba saba ve leş gibi kokan bir dilenciyle birlikte dönüyor. İhtiyar adam, hanedanlık renklerini görür görmez infazcılara doğru hızlanıp kendisini Üstat Voigtvir'e ya da Leydi Theodora'ya götürmeleri için yalvarıyor.
languages.original_text: The scouting team sent to the colony world returns with a decrepit, shaggy, foul-smelling vagrant in tow. The old man hastened toward the enforcers as soon as he saw the dynasty's colours, and implored them to take him to Master Voigtvir or Lady Theodora.
